values: I have been a happy motherfucker as of late. I don't know why....shit is still the same. It might be the result of a different take on life...I guess. I've learned to accept all of the bullshit that comes with an everyday existence. I skim over the years I've spent on this god forsaken hell hole...and I have a smile on my face???? What the fuck....am I nuts...am I a fruit loop short of a bowl of cereal? What turns a perpetual grimace into a smile? I think it may have to do with family and friends. I recall the memories of my life...and those are the events that brighten up my features.
http://alistarnash.livejournal.com/14722.html

Nooch to the nooch * Beats the hell out of some little fucks with hockey sticks* Yeah, I'm back on the block for another round of this Live Journal razzmatazz. It's like sugar in my coffee or A1 on my steak. Yes, it's refreshing to back on the web crafting threads like charlotte. I was camoflauged like a gorilla in the dark...like pinstripes on a wise guy. Now, I've come out Full Monty....and I don't mean Burns. 

What's Up LJ?
http://alistarnash.livejournal.com/14349.html

I have devised a fiendishly clever way of renting movies for free. It is not actually free per-se, but it is the next best thing.A movie chain near my house sells previous viewed movies for $5 a movie. This includes some of the newest releases. I buy four of these movies, watch them at my leisure without worrying about late fines. I then take these movies to Blockbuster(very close to my house also)where they give you $5 or more for each movie.I then choose to rent another movie from Blockbuster or keep the money.Is this not fiendishly clever? Another example, You know how people keep movies they rent for the maximum days allotted to them. There is an incentive to returning movies early, 1. You avoid late charges if some crazy occurrence fucks up your routine 2. You get a dollar in credit to rent another movie. A dollar might not seem like much and it really isn't, but if you're a movie buff like me, they add up quick. My intellect is wasted on the stupidest shit isn't it..heh. 

Use my jedi insanity well my patawans, it's always good to save yourself some green. Plus, renting movies for free utilizes the dork side of the force.
http://alistarnash.livejournal.com/12905.html

First off, I want to give mad props to all the snow plow drivers out there. You guys fucking rule....you go to great lengths to make the roads safe for jerkoffs like me to drive comfortably. You risk your own safety to plow the roads for commuters and you should be thanked properly. I raise my sock hat and gloves in salute to to your excellent service.Without the services of these men and women, a lot of people would be six feet deep or...hospitalized in form fitting paper ma che.We all see cars in ditches on the way to work and school...Right? So imagine those same drivers on the road without it being plowed...*I shudder to think about it*. Well thats enough of that rambling...lol.

I woke up this morning, threw back my comforter, swung out of bed and tripped over my cross trainers hit my head against my desk. There was a loud meaty smack, I stumbled like a drunk and crumpled to the floor.I lay motionless on my bedroom floor, groaning and holding the gash in my forehead. It felt like an elephant sat on my face and 'passed gas*' (*humiliation factor). I recovered seconds later and disinfected the cut.I was pissed at my utter carelessness and for being a clumsy oaf.I look at the shoes with a steely glare and I grumble under my breath. Damn exercise shoes almost took me out....damn them....and their fancy gel insoles. I left the shoes by the bed, because I  planned on taking my dogs for a walk. 

I got bundled up like a Siberian Cossack, which greatly reduces ones agility, and leashed up the pups. I wanted to exercise the dogs and a walk seemed to be what I needed to cool off. I headed out the door into the cold. The walk was as dandy as English aristocracy. My dog's sniffed a few butts and trees, urinated on a tree or four...you know all the normal dog stuff. Everything changed when I arrived at the park. It seems that the recent snowfall covered a 4 inch hole in the ground. Needless to say, I tripped and skated across the ground like a human bobsled.Luckily, I was unhurt and managed to round up the pups before their curiosity got the better of them.Yup,I'm a moron...heh..heh.I walked back to the house without incident thank Jesus(Hey-Zeus). This is UN-FUCKING BELIEVABLE, I'm a danger to myself and others today....stay far far away.
http://alistarnash.livejournal.com/12164.html

I woke up this morning and took and nice relaxing shower, had some Special K Almond and coffee. I open the sliding glass door, that opens onto my deck and I see a shit load cosmic dandruff....WTF.What the hell is with all the snow...I heard we are going to get a couple of feet. I sooo want to  get GOD some Head And Shoulders. 

I had to hit the sheets early Friday, because I had to work at 4:00am Saturday morning. I usually don't hit the sheets too early and when I do, a fucking blizzard ravages my community. I haven't been watching the news lately, so I was unaware of the shitstorm blowing through.See, my dumb ass needs to pay more attention to current events..heh..heh..oh..crimeny...jimeny. 

I had a pretty good day yesterday. I bought a shit load of video games from Blockbuster. They were having a buy two get one free sale,so I bought like fifteen games. What can I say....my willpower sucks when it comes to reduced price nerdage. The game I'm loving currently, is Resident Evil Outbreak. That game is soo pimp, there is nothing more rewarding than blowing up a city of zombies. I also, borrowed Silent Hill 3 from a buddy of mine(damn Blockbuster didn't have it). I love the Silent Hill games, They rock my socks in ball form. I'm still working on Silent Hill 2, but I'm at the end. 

I also rented Anchor Man, I fucking love Will Ferrell. I laughed as hard as a stoned Hyena, especially when Jack Black gets hit with a burrito. The fight scene between Ron and Veronica was awesome too. 

P.S. I haven't updated in awhile and I apologize. I've been busy with work and writing...well thats all for now. I hope everyone has a good weekend :).
http://alistarnash.livejournal.com/11850.html

First off I want to give props to a great man and pioneer for freedom in the U.S.A. Martin Luther King jr. I raise my goblet of rock to you. 

Now onto my nonsensical entry.... I woke up one morning and walked into my main washroom...I looked around and was dissatisfied with the surroundings.The walls were painted blue, the toilet was white, the fixtures were gold...it needed a change.Refinishing my washroom took  a lot less time than I though it would.I attacked the project with a frenzied passion...with blood sweat and beers, not to mention cigarettes. I installed a new toilet, fixtures, shower curtain,floor tile and painted the washroom. I woke up this morning and seemed to have quite a lot of energy, so I tackled the task.I painted the walls a silky beige and put in hardwood floor tile; Next, I installed the beige toilet,sink and tub.I looked over my work after I was finished...I was speechless...it was beautiful.I guess spending a few months with my uncle the carpenter in Georgia paid off. 

Remodeling my washroom was not an inconvenience because I have three washrooms and two showers in the house. I frequented these other less satisfying facilities, while my main washroom was under construction. I need to start working on the other washrooms...arggg.  

Well it's not the best of entries...but it's not the worst of entries...:0
http://alistarnash.livejournal.com/11752.html

I came in to work Saturday and thought it would be a normal work day. I was dead wrong. It appears that my company required me to head a special project. I was doing this in December and our client liked my performance...so I was drafted. I'm not complaining at all about it...the extra money is great and the request was flattering. I'm doing this project again next weekend, then alternating weekends. For those who missed me this Saturday I apologize.....I'm a workaholic. Ryan,Kevin,Jim,Foster,Joe,Dan and Maria, this is my new e-mail address,if you want it: ghengisrouse@yahoo.com. E-mail me.
http://alistarnash.livejournal.com/11458.html

I finally made it to the theater to see Blade trinity. I thought the movie was pretty cool; Even if that 7th heaven girl was in the movie...lol. She ended up being pretty cool in the movie. I was impressed with her action skills. Wesley Snipes was of course awesome in the role of Blade. I liked all of the previous Blade movies and have them on DVD(If you couldn't tell I'm a real Marvel Comic's nerd)The only thing about Blade that was irritating was Dracula. I mean, why does an ancient vampire have a gold chain that would put Mr.T's to shame. He even had the damn chain on when he changed forms. I was like,"no way is that chain going to metamorph with him is it" and it did alright. 

I seen Troy as well(what can i say it was a rainy day..heh..heh). The movie rocked the foundations of the universe. I was sooo impressed with this movie. I am definitely going to buy it. It will be placed in the same row of movies as the Punisher, Last samurai, Clerks, Crouching Tiger, Iron Monkey, Dark City,Bill & Ted,Buffy the vampire Slayer and Kurosawa's Ran. I wasn't expecting the movie to rule as much as it did...go and rent this movie now. That is the only command I'll give today..lol J/K. 

I also gave my two dog's a much needed bath. With all the rain we're getting they're filthy with mud every day. I have to clean them constantly because they love playing in the rain...silly pup's.They alway's love thrashing around, while I'm trying to bathe them. Especially my Black Lab/German Shepard, she loves making me furious then licking my face and giving me that vacant expression of her's. 

I want to wish everyone a good weekend, remember to party hardy...or...mildly if that is more appealing...laters :).
http://alistarnash.livejournal.com/11230.html

The morning from hell begins....now...no wait...ok now. I woke up this morning in a very pleasant mood. I had a smile as wide as a half moon axe. I rubbed the sleep from my eyes and proceeded to take a warm relaxing shower. After the shower, I was feeling the equivalent of sunshine and rainbows. I had a bowl of the greatest cereal in the known universe...Count Chocula. My day was going great...I couldn't have been happier. Until...DA..DA..DUM..I went out to get the mail.

I threw on some clothes and a jacket and went out to the mail box. I pass my car which is parked on the street and get the mail. I'm flipping through the letters and periodicals and noticed I had no bills. Is there no end to the beautifull day I'm having..I think. I pass my car yet again and notice something odd.I approach the passenger side of my car for a closer inspection. I see a huge ass crack of a dent in the side....WTF...I'm swearing like a one eyed pirate...you know..arrg this and matey that and junk...I'm seriously pissed on the high sea's. 

It seems that while I was in slumbersville, somebody's "I drive like complete shit" ass hit my car. The illiterate assmuncher didn't even leave a note, but he did leave dent.I'm going to find Larry Leadfoot and give him a peice of my mind....let me get my phonebook out...flipping to L's.J/K

Wow...look at the room going all carousel on me. I feel like I'm in a perpetual state of motion...yet I'm stationary. My bed was doing the disco slide so I decided to get up and move around a bit. I found that to be the worst idea of them all. I won't get all detailly, but IT WAS A REALLY BAD IDEA. My equilibrium is at odd's with me at present and there's a microscopic guy with a jackhammer inside my head. (right about now you think I drank like a fish huh?) Nope! I'm buzzing off paint fumes(well and some beer's as well,but I don't drink a lot). That's right I took avantage of our Indian Summer and painted my house.

The interior of my house needed a good coat of paint. I went to the store and picked up some white latex paint.White is probably my favorite color for an interior of a house.Indoors,the color white bring's a luster to the decor of the house. It reflect's light through the entire house brightening up dark corners. I'm really happy with the results. The house has a briliant radiance from the little work applied. Like every painter worth their weight,I got more paint on me than on the walls. 

"One more thing" as Uncle would say(inside joke). I want to wish everyone on my LJ friends list a rocking good New Year full of Good times and empty beers.
http://alistarnash.livejournal.com/9503.html

BTW, through a loophole in company policy, I was able to score 12 hours of holiday pay out of the work week (Corporate America..Don't fuck with me). So, Merry Christmas to all and all a good night(I just stole tiny tims thunder..HAHA).

I woke up this morning feeling a little blah...don't know why...meh...whatever. i had some OJ and hit the weights after about an hour I was feeling pretty good. With my new energy and luster I decided to hit the mall to research some gift ideas for a friend of mine(we're giving gifts after Christmas). I took a nice refreshing shower and dressed warmly. I open up the front door and I'm frozen like frosty..(damn..I'm thinking this is a bad idea). Well...I brave the cold and go out to warm up my car,I leave it run for five minutes and have some coffee. 

I go outside and enter the blistfull warmth that is my car(I love my car). So I'm in a good mood and am in good spirits. I get to the mall, park my car and traverse the many shop's. I came out of there with nothin' that's right no ideas...no merchandise...nada. I forgot my wallet at home*I curse my memory and lack of one...* and head back home. I grab the wallet and head back.

Now the mall is packed...it's jumping like Jordan on crack. I drive around for awhile and see a spot*rub my eyes* That's right ROCK STAR parking, right in front of the mall. I'm elated that i won't be freezing my ass off walking to the mall. I notice the guy ringing the bell outside and I feel bad for him,it's like FUCKING ASS COLD outside and he's ringing a bell out there. I deposit two dollars into the bin and make a beeline to Gloria Jeans(coffee) I buy a large coffee and bring it out to the guy, I wish him a merry Christmas and commence my shopping. I found a DVD I was looking for but that's it(I ended up picking up the fourth season of the simpsons). I still don't know what to get my friend...it's cool though.....I'll think of something.

Ok..I went grocery shopping today at Dominicks. I was roaming the isles like a tourist in New york. I still have'nt memorized the layout of the store. Some of the soccer mom's were giving me the 'evil eye' for blocking the isles while reading the signs....(What's up with that). I apologized for being in THEIR way and they were less than appreciative (I got a EXCUSE MEEEE or a Outa the WAyyy)I was like ok...sorry for existing. 

I gathered all of the products I was looking for and headed to the register to pay. while on my way to the front....I heard a wail like a thunderclap..I whipped my head around and looked to see if a wounded mule had somehow stumbled into the store. Nope, it was a little kid whining about something. This kid had the pipes of an opera singer, I mean damn. I was looking at the frail little soccer mom and see seemed perplexed as what to do. To make things worse this kid grabbed onto my cart as I try to pass him. (ok let me tell you something I don't dislike children, but this kid was pissing me off). I tell the mom to please do something about her child, he was on a verge of throwing a shitstorm of a tantrum.  Well she tried to talk to the little hellspawn, but to no avail. So I took charge of the situation, I looked at the kid with my mean face and the little dude started laughing...LAUGHING....Ok..well at least I got him to calm down. 

I really wish parents knew how to control their children. A little discipline would go along way with these children.More parents have to take childcare more seriously, the child is pure innocence as he enters the world and is shaped by his surroundings. I was raised with very strict discipline (my father being in the military) and i think i turned out a... little... normal. 

Eh.....
http://alistarnash.livejournal.com/6823.html

A faint buzz of conversation emits from a crowded little coffee shop, as Devon pulls on the brass doorknob and enters. He notices a variety of cultures inhabiting the trendy "cup a joe". Devon likes the fact that his home town is a melting pot of races and cultures. He finds the cultural diversity to be magical and interesting, plus he loves the food.

Once entering the the little shop, Devon wait's patiently in a line to the right of the door way. He is behind five other people and the line is moving awfully slow.Scanning his surrounding's to keep himself occupied, he notices some beautiful artwork. On the wall he is leaning on, hangs a portrait by the famous Simon clark; It is a Barren landscape of gray twisted gnarled oaks,cracked and dried up earth,emaciated coyotes and in the midst of all this, a lone daffodil is vigilantly sprouting anew.Devon direct's his gaze toward the seating area and settles upon the furniture,Ornate cherrywood High backed chairs surround circular hand crafted oaken tables. Devon being an ex carpenter marvels at the craftsmanship, adoring each hand crafted rose, wolves head, skull and goat etched into the sides of each chair and tables legs. 

Eh.....I'm not too fond of this....

Well....I finished wrapping my Christmas presents today. They are the sorriest looking thing's you've ever seen. I think one of them actually resembles a gift. I tend not to use boxes when I wrap,I don't keep them around and forget to ask for them. I bought the Frosty the snow clown wrapping paper(Frosty is wearing clothes that look like a clown's and has a big red nose, thus earning the moniker snow clown). The wrapping paper made me laugh to tears. I wrote a little diddy about my gift wrapping, here it is:
Ali drives to store, Ali buy's some shit
Ali goes insane, while he's wrapping gifts
uses two rolls of tape,
5 rubber bands, 2 balls of yarn
and 2... tubes.. of... paper. Yeah, I know....it suck's....right?

I woke up at 7:00am on the 8th of december to make it down to the courthouse at 9:00am. I showered, shaved and did the rest of my morning routine. I threw on some jeans and a T-shirt and headed out the door. Being tired and cold, I went to Starbucks for a pick me up. I chatted with the cashier who has a crush on me and got my venti coffee for free(gotta love it). I drove from Romeoville to Downtown Joliet, without spilling a drop of the coffee.

I arrived in Town at 7:45am.While in joliet, I drove all over looking for a parking spot that was not a million miles away from the court house(I was unsuccessfull).Wow...after about half and hour I find a spot,I parked by one of the hourly meters and watched the meter maid give someone a ticket. *chuckling evilly* I deposited .50 in the meter, which gives me two hours. I had to walk about two miles to the court house and it was freezing outside.My coffee was ice cold by the time I reached my destination. I ended up tossing half the cup in a trash receptacle. I enter the building freezing my ass off and am harassed by the guard's there about my studded leather belt(bastards). I told them I'd take it off, but they gave me attitude anyhow.

The line into the courtroom was half a mile long. It was long past nine o the clock when we were seated and checked in (our vigilant legal system running like a well oiled machine). When they actually called my name, I was told to come back on the 13th of January...WTF. I was pissed...I waited all this fucking time to get this shit over with, only to have to come back again in January. I FUCKING HATE OUR LEGAL SYSTEM AND ALL IT"S BULLSHIT!!!
http://alistarnash.livejournal.com/5111.html

I'm working till' 6:00am and I have to be at the courthouse promptly at 9:00am tomorrow. There is nothing like being in court while you're half asleep. The omnipotent Magistrate of law & order will probably have to repeat his questions. Whatever, I just want to get this over with. 

I'll end this entry on a high note. I was given tomorrow off with pay. My supervisor said,"I'm doing this because you have been such a Model employee".*Completely took by surprise* I responded with a stammered, wow... thanks. 




If I fight the law will the law win? Stay tuned to find out, "the same Bat time and the same Bat channel".

I woke up this morning and started my usual exercise routine, Sit ups, push ups, weight training and treadmill. I love the feeling you get after a good work out. I took a shower then had a Blueberry scone to replace some of the energy I spent. While having breakfast I decided to break out my camera and take holiday Photo's of my Black LAb/German Shepard.

I got out the Santa hat and attempted to put it on my dog. This was an exercise in futility, my dog Nikki went ape shit and tore the shit out my living room. My lamp was knocked over by my flailing Shepard's "Tail O DOOM", the candy dish went sailing across the living room like a rocket and smashed against the bay window. I was like, "WHAT THE FUCK"! Skittles were scattered to the four corners of the earth, I hunted for them like I was looking for Saddam. 

I finally calmed Nikki down by giving her a treat. She get's so excited when you try to take her picture,(Doggie Diva) I guess she doesn't like the flash, I dunno. Argggg..... I love my dog's, but they make me soooo mad sometimes.

My day started off in Tenor, then crashed into barritone. Ah... I still had fun and got the picture too. I'll try to post it sometime before Christmas. Peace.

I was driving into work, I stopped at a red light by the intersections of Weber rd. and Normantown rd. I'm listening to pretty hate machine"grooving" when "smash"! some jack off in a pick up hits me in the rear. I get out of my nissan altima to inspect the damage(which is not even a year old)I restain myself from ripping the fuckers head off,I tell him to pull into the nearest gas station. He tell's me that some truck driver gave him the finger,so he was not paying attention to the road. I tell him to give me his insurance info and I get the police to come to the scene.

  I wait for abot twenty minutes for the cop to show up and when he does, the bastard makes me wait for another forty. While he sit's comfortly in his air conditioned car doing paper work. The cop doesn't even look at the damage on the car,then writes on the police report that it was less than $500( I got multiple estimates that indicate the damage being more than a thousand dollar's).

  Now after all the fun, I'm playing phone tag with the claim's adjuster from "pick up's" insurance company.

I think John Kerry is as fake as pam Andersons breasts. He drones on about the most popular issues, such as: lowering gas prices, establishing independent fuel reserves, to stop relying on mid eastern resources.kerry say's he will stop bashing Bush to focus on important issues, he should have done that from the start.He is counting on sympathy for his tour in vietnam, my father was in Nam and he does not like to talk about it.Soldiers from Nam have horrible memories from a pointless war, I for one would'nt vote for some trying to exploit that.

  Dubya is no better, he is maybe the only president in history to wrack up such a astronomical national debt. I understand that he is trying to rebuild a new democratic Iraq, but these people have lived a certain way for thousands of years.Who are we to try to change there society to reflect american values, considering we are one of the youngest nations in the world. There were super powers that crumbled such as Russia and Germany, who are just starting to recover.
  Well, maybe Kerry and Edwards are the lesser of two evils but I would like to see Dubya clean up his mess.
